title: Michigan State Rep. Isaac Robinson Dies from Suspected Coronavirus Infection in Detroit - Getaka.co.in
description: Michigan State Rep. Isaac Robinson Dies from Suspected Coronavirus Infection in Detroit Getaka.co.in Michigan state lawmaker dies of suspected coronavirus infection | TheHill The Hill View Full Coverage on Google News
content:
Michigan State Representative Isaac Robinson died on Sunday morning in Detroit after he was hospitalized hours earlier over respiratory issues. Robinson had not been tested for COVID-19, but his mother says the virus is suspected to have caused his death.
